title: The Dancing Breeze
content:
The Dancing Breeze Very Rare 3~12 Damage 1d10 +2 Slashing Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Tiny specks of blood are fused into the blade, as if the glaive is feeding on them. Glaive Two-Handed Extra Reach Finesse 2.7 960

The Dancing Breeze

1d10 +2 Slashing

Weapon Enchantment +2

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Tiny specks of blood are fused into the blade, as if the glaive is feeding on them.

Glaive Two-Handed Extra Reach Finesse

The Dancing Breez
